title: More important than Brexit: Record employment and rising pay is what really makes people happy
text:
Complaining about work is one of the great luxuries of employment. Bad bosses, long commutes, tax bills - but the alternative is far worse.

Unemployment not only wreaks a terrible toll on family finances - it also causes significant and long-lasting damage to a person’s life satisfaction and wellbeing.

That harm can be undone bit by bit through work, and the huge rise in employment over the past decade has translated into major improvements in wellbeing and falls in anxiety.

Employment is at record highs, unemployment has fallen to levels not seen in more than 40 years, while pay growth is now rising at its fastest pace in 11 years. The result is happier Brits.
description: Complaining about work is one of the great luxuries of employment.
